name: Grotto Down
description:
Grotto Down is an endless runner that was made for ludum dare 48, the game is heavily inspired by DownWell. In Grotto Down you play as Jerry, a hard at work miner. Jerry uses his trusty pickaxe to get around as his body is not what it used to be.

Control schema:

Point and click! - Jerry will follow your directions (Hopefully :P)

Grotto Down was made using Game Maker: Studio 2, Pyxel edit, Audacity and tons of caffeine.
